MVAU Project File Generator (gen_mvau_files.py)

Author(s): Syed Asad Alam syed.as[xxx]ad.alam@tcd[xxx].ie

This file generates a .prj file which lists all verilog files to be compiled when running simulation. A .prj file is generated because the number of memories change depending on the number of PEs. The .prj file is used by 'xelab' command which elaborates the design

This material is based upon work supported, in part, by Science Foundation Ireland, www.sfi.ie under Grant No. 13/RC/2094_P2 and, in part, by the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under the Marie Sklodowska-Curie grant agreement Grant No.754489.

Functions
gen_mvau_files
def gen_mvau_files(
pe
)

This function generates the file by using a series of write commands

Parameter
pe

Number of processing elements

parser
def parser()

This function defines an ArgumentParser object for command line arguments

Parser object (parser)

__main__
if __name__ == "__main__"

Entry point of the file, retrieves the command line arguments and calls the gen_mvau_files function with the required arguments
